titleStmt.title: The right way to promote reformation in a sermon preached at Warrington upon the 18th of Octob. 1698, at the appointment of the ministers there met, and at the request of some, published for the use of others / by James Naylor.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect : pages tightly bound, with print showthrough and some loss of print. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
